control_attributes.control_description: The organization applies nondestructive sanitization techniques to portable storage devices prior to connecting such devices to the information system under the following circumstances: [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances requiring sanitization of portable storage devices].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization documents information system media downgrading actions.
